description:
For each instance that the extended-status extension is working on, it performs a new query; these could be batched into a single query similar to what Johannes did for the disk-config extension.

At least in the case of the disk-config extension, we found a substantial performance gain when this fix was made.
title: Extended Status extension performs n-lookup queries

comments.content:
